Yesterday at @SenateCommerce I questioned @JimBridenstine on the future of the @Space_Station. I remain firm in my stance that the #ISS should continue to be federally funded & operate until at least 2030.

Today, I am calling for a national moratorium on the death penalty. It is morally wrong, ineffective, and applied unequally. In America, nobody should be executed. We are better than this.
https://www.npr.org/2019/03/14/702707072/in-her-pitch-for-president-kamala-harris-focuses-on-criminal-justice-inequality

The death penalty is a deeply flawed system. DNA has proven that there are people convicted and sentenced to death who turned out to be innocent. This is a sentence that has been disproportionately applied against people of color and in particular Black and brown men.

Last month, I told @federalreserve Chair Powell that he needs to hear from workers & consumers before approving the @Suntrust & @BBT merger, instead of making a deal behind closed doors.
